event.title: became part and headquarters of 17th District in the state, Moga district of Punjab state on 24th day of November 1995

data.event: It became part and headquarters of 17th District in the state, Moga district of Punjab state on 24th day of November 1995, by then Chief Minister Harcharan Singh Brar.

In April 2015, Moga gained national infamy due to the death of a teenage girl and injury of her mother, when they were molested and thrown from a running Orbit Aviation bus near Gil village, in Moga district.
It spreads over an area on 2230 km2, which comes to 4.42% of the Punjab State.
